attributes.action: Call for a general election through vote of no confidence
attributes.background: Call for a general election due to vote of no confidence

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions which call for the same action:

Give the British Public the Right to Vote No Confidence in the Government 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/734311

Call an immediate general election 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727309
